description: Wilton Gregory, Washington DC's archbishop, is among 13 new cardinals to be nominated.
title: Wilton Gregory: Pope Francis names first African-American cardinal
title_page: Wilton Gregory: Pope Francis names first African-American cardinal - BBC News
maintext: In the US, Archbishop Gregory has been a prominent voice in the effort to root out abuse within the Church. As president of the US bishops' conference, he persuaded Church leaders to adopt tougher penalties for abusers in 2002.
